March 26, 1951 D Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
Othello
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20, 4th £10. 24th Annual Contest. 9 bands competed.
